verses.name: Luke 18:6
verses.text: And the Lord said, Hear what the unjust judge saith.

verses.name: Luke 18:7
verses.text: And shall not God avenge his own elect, which cry day and night unto him, though he bear long with them?

verses.name: Luke 18:8
verses.text: I tell you that he will avenge them speedily. Nevertheless when the Son of man cometh, shall he find faith on the earth?

verses.name: Luke 18:9
verses.text: And he spake this parable unto certain which trusted in themselves that they were righteous, and despised others:

verses.name: Luke 18:10
verses.text: Two men went up into the temple to pray; the one a Pharisee, and the other a publican.
